sentences.english: This is an open top outrigger kayak that converts into a tent with ease.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個開放前支腿皮艇可以轉換成輕鬆帳篷。

sentences.english: The men collected rain-water in the rubber dinghy.
sentences.chinese: 他們用橡皮艇蓄積雨水。

sentences.english: Kayaks were originally developed by the Inuit, the native inhabitants of Canada.
sentences.chinese: 皮艇起初是由加拿大的土著居民因紐特人開創出來的。

sentences.english: They also have access to an inflatable canoe for above-water excursions.
sentences.chinese: 他們也可以通過充氣皮艇進行水上觀光。
女子比賽只限於皮艇賽。

sentences.english: Kayakers paddle on Lac Bouchard in La Mauricie National Park.
sentences.chinese: 遊客可以在摩麗斯國家公園查德湖上劃皮艇槳。

sentences.english: If you plan to build this kayak consider building a model.
sentences.chinese: 如果您計劃建立這一皮艇考慮建立一個模型。

sentences.english: In order to meet the travelers' requirements for stimulation, they also developed the drifting with rubber boats.
sentences.chinese: 爲滿足遊人驚險刺激的要求，開發了橡皮艇漂流項目。

sentences.english: The kayakers avoided the rocks in the river.
sentences.chinese: 皮艇避開了河中的礁石。

sentences.english: In his spare time he likes to bike, camp, kayak, and work out.
sentences.chinese: 在閒暇時間，他喜歡騎車，野營，皮艇和鍛鍊。

definition: stand-up paddleboarding (SUP)/stand-up paddleboard/blade of a propeller/blade of an oar
